About

My name is Alban Lorillard, I'm 23 and i'm an IT engineering student at Polytech Nantes, the graduate engineering school of University of Nantes.

Computer enthusiast, when i was 12, i designed my own first websites by learning myself web languages like html, css, php... . Today, my web learning focus on fullstack JS website with NodeJS, AngularJS etc... .

I describe myself calm and persistant about technologies. I enjoy to have goals and work with a team.

My scientist and computing training make me able to have an algoritmic thinking about computing challenges.
